doc.name: no_submit_on_return
doc.synopsis: Disable enter key submitting a form
doc.description:
An HTML form usually gets submitted on pressing enter when there's like one text field. To disable that use the no_submit_on_return option.

This will add some JavaScript to the form disabling form submission on enter.
doc.example:
<wsform action="addToWiki" no_submit_on_return >
  Your form elements here
</ wsform>
